contributors.name: Crow
contributors.description: Founder and visionary behind Trinity Launcher. Leads conceptual development and defines the strategic direction of the project.

contributors.name: JavierC
contributors.description: Co-creator who actively participates in the launcher's development while supervising the project. Ensures quality and team coordination.

contributors.name: Orta
contributors.description: Project co-supervisor with experience in software architecture and technical leadership. Oversees the implementation of key functionalities.

contributors.name: MrTanuk
contributors.description: Contributed to core development alongside JavierC and played a key role in resolving technical issues.

contributors.name: Ezequiel
contributors.description: Frontend designer and developer specialized in modern interfaces. Responsible for the visual design and user experience of Trinity Launcher.

contributors.name: KevinRunforrestt
contributors.description: Managed the translation of markdown documentation files and provided assistance to the development team.

contributors.name: IoselDev
contributors.description: Contributed exclusively by creating the PKGBUILD for the AUR package.

contributors.name: HylianSoul
contributors.description: Contributed to the Catalan translation of the launcher and provided valuable assistance to the community.

contributors.name: Future Contributor
contributors.description: This spot is reserved for future collaborators who want to help improve Trinity Launcher. Join us!
